i) Candidate who have passes in Mathematics and Physics at the G.C.E. (A/Level) or its equivalent and have in addition, three other credit passes in SSCE or GCE (O/Level) or its equivalent.

ii) Holders of the Ordinary National Diploma (OND) in Surveying and related field from a NBTE accredited Institution.
UTME Requirements: Five (5) credit in SSCE/GCE including English Language, Mathematics, Economics and any other two subjects from Chemistry, Physics, Geography, Biology, Agricultural Science and Technical Drawing.
Subjects: Mathematics, Physics and any one of Chemistry or Geography

Subjects: Physics, Mathematics, and any of Chemistry, Geography, Art, Biology and Economics.

Direct Entry Requirements:
In addition to the UTME Entry requirement, holders of Higher School Certificate (HSC)/ GCE A' Level two subject including Geography and one subject from the following: Mathematics, Economics, Biology, Physics, Chemistry, Technical Drawing and Fine Arts.

Holder of National Diploma (ND) in the field relevant to Environmental Science or similar qualifications can be considered for direct entry admission, provided they satisfy the conditions above and of which the candidate's score is NOT less than 60% average (upper credit) equivalent.
UTME Requirements: To be eligible for admission, candidate must have Five (5) credit in SSCE or its equivalent in English Language, Mathematics, Geography and any two other subject from Economics, Biology, Physics, Chemistry, Technical Drawing and Fine Arts or Government.
Subjects: Mathematics and any two other subject from Geography, Economics, Physics, Biology, Chemistry, Technical Drawing, Fine Arts and Government
